title: Food that doesn't specify in ingredients what spices are used, it may contain nutmeg assim al hakeem
transcript: this question from the UK when you buy halal food or permissible food and it says in the list of materials that it has spices you can eat without any problem what if it contains uh uh nutmeg again you did not know about it and it is an issue of dispute whether it's Halal or Haram so for the benefit of the doubt there is no problem in consuming this inshallah as long as the food itself is halal as
